name: JermaKart!
description:
Welcome to Jermakart! Jermakart is a Jerma985 fangame inspired by Mariokart and it's more superior variant SRB2K. The game is not simply a clone however, it innovates most kart racer games because of the amount of air manuverability in the game. You can jump, double jump, and even air dash in any 4 directions! There is also rail grinding The racer assets are pulled from the Jerma Greenscreen Stream.

Race in Jerma's meat grinder level againt 4 other bots trained with reinforcement learning.
